channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I have been living in mattress hell’: I bought a dud — twice. How can I get my money back?
item.description: “I am completely disgusted by the lack of accountability and the failure to honor warranties.”

item.title: Gold’s rise above $5,000 shows why it should be in every investor’s portfolio
item.description: Gold is the hedge against economic and geopolitical risks that can’t be diversified any other way.

item.title: ‘It’s an expensive piece of equipment’: My neighbor asked to borrow my snowblower. Do I say yes?
item.description: “The projected snowfall this weekend doesn’t look to be changing too much.”
